definitions: (abstract) This place; this location.; (abstract) This time, the present situation.
examples: An Alzheimer patient's here may in his mind be anywhere he called home in the time he presently re-lives.

definitions: Filler after a noun or demonstrative pronoun, solely for emphasis.; Filler after a demonstrative pronoun but before the noun it modifies, solely for emphasis.
examples: John here is a rascal.; This here orange is too sour.
